member.name: T:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for mapping ExtendableEnums in LiteDB.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions.RegisterAllInt32BasedExtendableEnums(LiteDB.BsonMapper,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Registers mappings for all ExtendedEnums in a given assembly that have a Value property type of Int32.
member.param: The for which the mapping will be registered.
The assembly to search for ExtendableEnums.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions.RegisterAllInt32BasedExtendableEnums(LiteDB.BsonMapper,System.Type)
member.summary: Registers mappings for all ExtendedEnums in an assembly containing a given type that have a Value property type of Int32.
member.param: The for which the mapping will be registered.
A which is contained in an which is to be searched.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions.RegisterAllStringBasedExtendableEnums(LiteDB.BsonMapper,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Registers mappings for all ExtendedEnums in a given assembly that have a Value property type of string.
member.param: The for which the mapping will be registered.
The assembly to search for ExtendableEnums.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions.RegisterAllStringBasedExtendableEnums(LiteDB.BsonMapper,System.Type)
member.summary: Registers mappings for all ExtendedEnums in an assembly containing a given type that have a Value property type of string.
member.param: The for which the mapping will be registered.
A which is contained in an which is to be searched.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions.RegisterExtendableEnumAsInt32(LiteDB.BsonMapper,System.Type)
member.summary: Registers mappings for a specific ExtendableEnum type with a Value property type of Int32.
member.param: The for which the mapping will be registered.
An ExtendableEnum which is to be registered.

member.name: M:ExtendableEnums.LiteDB.BsonMapperExtensions.RegisterExtendableEnumAsString(LiteDB.BsonMapper,System.Type)
member.summary: Registers mappings for a specific ExtendableEnum type with a Value property type of string.
member.param: The for which the mapping will be registered.
An ExtendableEnum which is to be registered.
